summary: This bill, the "Alleviating Spaceport Traffic by Rewarding Operators Act of 2025," establishes a pilot program to provide grants to launch and reentry site operators. The Secretary of Transportation can issue grants for infrastructure improvements at these sites, specifically to improve transportation and safety. Grant amounts are determined by the number of launches and reentries, with supplemental grants available for matching funds.  Total annual grant funding is capped at $20 million, and the program sunsets on October 1, 2030.
